titles.title: Commending the Kingdom of Morocco for designating a "National Women's Day" to be observed each year on October 10, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: 9/29/2008--Introduced. Recognizes the important political, economic, cultural, and artistic achievements of the Kingdom of Morocco and the Moroccan people. Reaffirms the historic friendship between the people of Morocco and the United States. Congratulates the government of Morocco and His Majesty King Mohammed VI for designating National Women's Day.
